extensionDescription.message: Provides ability to save selected tabs to local files.

dialog_inputDescription.message: Input a folder name to save files within

startup_useDownloadDirOptionNote_title.message: Important note before start using Save Selected Tabs to Files

startup_useDownloadDirOptionNote_message.message: You should configure Firefox itself before using this addon. Click here to see more details.

useDownloadDirOption_note.message: It is strongly recommended to configure Firefox itself to save downloaded files to a single folder: Firefox settings => "General" => "Files and Applications" => "Downloads" => choose "Save files to". If "Always ask you where to save files" is chosen, you'll see a "save file as..." common dialog for every files downloaded from tabs, and it will be too annoying.

config_saveTabsPrefix_description.message: *Path under the download folder. "/" will be recognized as a path delimiter. A `%input%` placeholder in the path produces a diaglog to input folder name when you try to save.

config_allUrlsPermissionGranted_label.message: Guess filename extension based on Content-Type of tabs

config_showContextCommandOnTab_label.message: Show context menu item in the context menu on tabs

config_showContextCommandOnPage_label.message: Show context menu item in the context menu on the content area

config_showContextCommandForSingleTab_la.message: Show context menu item even if there is no multiselection

config_clearSelectionAfterCommandInvoked.message: Clear selection after a command is invoked
